methods.name: getEntity
javadoc: Gets the tile entity as currently held, or (if it has not gotten it from the world) loads it from the world.

methods.name: getState
javadoc: Gets the block state as currently held, or (if it has not gotten it from the world) loads it from the world.
This will only look up the state from the world if {@link #forceLoad} is true or the block position is loaded.

methods.name: hasState
javadoc: Creates a new {@link Predicate} that will match when the given {@link IBlockState} predicate matches.
